com.github.alexmojaki.caseclasses.serialization

Interface CSVWriter.Formatter

  • Enclosing class:
    CSVWriter

    public static interface CSVWriter.Formatter
    This interface determines the syntax of the CSV used and how parsers will disambiguate where the fields start and end and how special characters should be interpreted. Note that escape characters are already escaped before this is applied. Built-in formatters are provided as constants in this interface. Utilities for writing formatters are provided in CSVWriter.Formatter.Utils.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CSVWriter.Formatter.Utils 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CSVWriter.Formatter ALWAYS_QUOTE
      Always enclose the value in quotes.
      static CSVWriter.Formatter ESCAPE_SEPARATORS
      Escape separators in the value.
      static CSVWriter.Formatter QUOTE_IF_NEEDED
      Enclose the value in quotes if it contains any separators.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void format(StringBuilder value, char separator, char quote, char escape)
      Modify the given StringBuilder, which will be written to the CSV, based on the given special characters.

    • Field Detail

      • ESCAPE_SEPARATORS

        static final CSVWriter.Formatter ESCAPE_SEPARATORS
        Escape separators in the value. The quote character plays no role in this format.

      • ALWAYS_QUOTE

        static final CSVWriter.Formatter ALWAYS_QUOTE
        Always enclose the value in quotes. Escape any quotes within the value.

      • QUOTE_IF_NEEDED

        static final CSVWriter.Formatter QUOTE_IF_NEEDED
        Enclose the value in quotes if it contains any separators. Always escape any quotes within the value.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        void format(StringBuilder value,
            char separator,
            char quote,
            char escape)
        Modify the given StringBuilder, which will be written to the CSV, based on the given special characters.
